tasks.title: Daily Visual Check
tasks.description: Check activity, posture, breathing, and general alertness. Note anything unusual.

tasks.title: Check Temperature and Humidity
tasks.description: Verify temps and humidity are within target ranges for your species.

tasks.title: Check Water
tasks.description: Replace or refresh drinking water. Clean dish if soiled.

tasks.title: Spot Clean
tasks.description: Remove waste and uneaten food. Check for mold or damp spots.

tasks.title: Feed (Adjust to Species)
tasks.description: Feed on a schedule appropriate for age and species. Track appetite and refusals.

tasks.title: Equipment Check
tasks.description: Confirm heat, UVB, and timers are working as expected.

tasks.title: Weigh and Log
tasks.description: Weigh your animal and log the result to spot trends early.

tasks.title: Deep Clean Enclosure
tasks.description: Deep clean surfaces and decor. Replace substrate if needed. Use reptile-safe cleaner.
